I have purchased this game with advertised 66inventions. However only 6 and are available and the rest are locked. I claim my money back.
replyContent: Sorry for your troubles with the game. You need to clear four out of six inventions on a page to unlock the next page with inventions. Start play the game and you will soon be able to play all of the included inventions.

content: My 4 year old really likes this game.  He's able to solve most of the puzzles on his own even with the extra parts turned on.

Loved the Inventions 2 that came with our Samsung Tab S.  Purchased and installed the deluxe only to find it crashing whenever we try to run it.  Re-installs do nothing.   Something horribly wrong here.

We bought this app on iOS then on Android as all our kids wanted to be play it. They have loved the problem solving. We had an issue with it working on my daughter's restricted profile. Emailed the developer and he was excellent. It turned out we needed to permit Google Play Services in Settings\advanced\apps with usage access\google play services

Great game and the fact it comes pre - loaded on the kids Samsung tablet we got our 3 yr old for xmas is a clue that it is geared more towards kids. It gets their little brains into puzzle solving mode so much so I've purchased the game for my phone as well so my kids don't fight over who plays it next. Great fun pass time for kids and adults alike. 5 stars.

I feel I got ripped off. I loved the game don't get me wrong great game. But when he first comes out and talks to you he says I have made new even harder puzzles for you. WRONG!!! They are the same puzzles from the first one. I bought the Deluxe one first and liked it so I went and bought the first one because he said the Deluxe was new puzzles. I was mad when I realized that they were the same ones. I am not buying the second one that is for sure. Here is a gold star.
